response.overview: The artistic youth, who had been beaten up, finally found a job in the factory, bringing relief to the masses! Two misunderstood artistic young women showcased their hobbies in the film and eventually joined the workforce, becoming the historical dust that petty bourgeois despised. The film, also known as "The Chronicle of Liang Guo's Entry into the Factory," tells the story of Liang Guo, who, due to his excessive love for literature and art, failed to get into a prestigious university and ended up working in a factory. Liang Guo's experience failed to elicit sympathy from any petty bourgeois but instead led to their insults. This illustrates the grim future for literature and art enthusiasts, where only the pursuit of capitalist pleasures remains the future for urban youths.
response.title: Dissociated State

titles.title: The Chronicle of Liang Guo's Entry into the Factory

results.name: 解离态 Dissociated State (预告片 Trailer) (朋克张 Punk Zhang, 2022)
